uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.servlet

Class FileUploadWebappContextListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • FileCleanerCleanup
      • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.servlet.FileUploadWebappContextListener

  • public class FileUploadWebappContextListener
extends FileCleanerCleanup
    ContextListener that ensures threads created by apache commons file upload are shutdown. failing to shutdown or delaying initialisation seems to cause classloader memory leaks. This now just extends the official commons listener.
